channel.title: Need a coder any willling to help
channel.description: hi iv made a new server and its my 1st time and i need a coder for things like shops where u start monsters droping things and so on if u help u will b an admin of the server add me itpickup1@hotmail.co.uk thx :)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 23, 2006, 02:56:35 AM[/size][hr]no one help meh ='(

item.title: Need a coder any willling to help
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“jake pickup, post:1, topic:19602”]hi iv made a new server and its my 1st time and i need a coder for things like shops where u start monsters droping things and so on if u help u will b an admin of the server add me itpickup1@hotmail.co.uk
thx :)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 23, 2006, 02:56:35 AM[/size][hr]no one help meh =’([/quote]
Well you don’t need a coder at all. You can just read the tutorials on this site, I know it seems hard to learn at first but the more you do it the easier it will get

Read full topic
item.source: Need a coder any willling to help
